original_text: And they shall bear the curtains of the tabernacle, and the tabernacle of the congregation, his covering, and the covering of the badgers' skins that is above upon it, and the hanging for the door of the tabernacle of the congregation,
korean_text: 곧 그들이 성막의 휘장들과 회막과 그 덮개와 그 위의 해달의 가죽 덮개와 회막 휘장 문을 메며

sentences.original_text: And they shall bear the curtains of the tabernacle,
and the tabernacle of the congregation,
and the covering of the badgers' skins that is above upon it,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 있는 오소리 가죽 덮개를 메고,

sentences.original_text: and the hanging for the door of the tabernacle of the congregation,
sentences.korean_translation: 회중의 성막 문을 위한 휘장을 질 것이라
